attributes.action: To open the bus lanes in London for Motorcycles. For Boris to give a date to go ahead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ask Boris to honour his promise to open bus lanes for motorcycles. Allowing motorcycles to use bus lanes which has been shown to have no negative effect for safety in London. Other cities have had trials which prove this is a benefit to all users on the road. I and other Motorcyclists voted for the Mayor to follow his commitment in the transport manifesto to open the capital’s bus lanes. I / We now demand he renew that commitment by immediately stating the date by which we should expect access to all bus lanes under his control.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Transport for London
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
